website_summaries.verdict: These vibrant floral decals are ideal for accent walls, bedrooms, and nurseries.
pros: Floral design based on original artwork
Individual elements are large enough for accent walls
Package includes 6 flowers, 7 large leaves and 15 small leaves
Suitable for both traditional and modern interior themes
cons: Adhesive can fail within weeks, especially in humid conditions

customer_reviews.title: Love these flowers
customer_reviews.text: We bought two sets of this because we had high ceilings and a big wall to cover. They were so easy to apply and we love the way they turned out. A helpful tip...cut out the flowers and leaves prior to application and tape them to the wall. That helped us decide where we wanted to place everything without peeling them off the wall several times.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Well made, big, and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful! They are big enough to be a statement piece and the printing is done very well! It’s also made of a very nice and luxury feeling vinyl. I’m so happy I came across these because I found something similar for much more expensive before finding these and these seem to be just as nice/beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: CaityJ

customer_reviews.title: No longer adhering to the wall...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 1 year ago for my daughter’s nursery. Initially I would give these 5 stars for easy application, and great look. However, now they are no longer sticking to the wall. I followed the simple directions, and these were applied to a clean wall. Not sure why they’re not sticking anymore. I’ve had to remove these for fear of them falling on my daughter while she is sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fabulous product! I've used many different quality decals before (cheaper ones, ones from Blik, etc.), and these are very unique and worth every penny! The texture and vinyl is a matte texture, which makes it look more painted on the wall. It was incredibly easy to place the flowers by myself (which is awesome to say for large format decals). I placed them on a textured and painted drywall surface with no issues. I'll update if I have any difficulty with peeling up, but I dont forsee that being an issue. Really worth it!
customer_reviews.author: K. Cannady

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I was really hesitant to buy this because of the price but it was worth the money. The decals are easily removed and reapplied several times. They're a very good size so can be difficult to apply perfectly, I did it myself but I recommend and extra set of hands and a spacle knife to smooth out any wrinkles or air bubbles. They look amazing in the nursery and I'm so glad I spent the extra money on these!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this 5 stars because the product is great. The flowers are beautiful and exactly as pictured. They stick easily, we literally had to deal with 0 bubbles or wrinkles. Also we struggled with placement and were able to gently peel them up and restick them for the exact look we wanted. I do want to advise if you want the look from the photo it can be quite time consuming as each sticker, leaves included, are indiclvidual so you have to make sure each one is exactly where it needs to go. It did take us several hours to place them the way we wanted, but we can be very meticulous. Other thank that the product is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: They look absolutely beautiful and are a great size!
customer_reviews.text: We all love these peonies! I bought the vivid pink. They look gorgeous in my daughter’s room and are half of the price of some similar flowers that I initially found on Pinterest! I had to move a few and I had absolutely no problem getting them to stick back to the wall. I did wait almost 3 weeks to put them up on the wall after I repainted the room. They are more $, but worth every penny☺️! Buy them!
customer_reviews.author: ALT

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Stunning
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughters room; and frankly didn’t know what to expect. Well, this purchase was a great one! It came perfectly packaged, with no kinks or bends. The directions were clear and easy to follow. We decided to roll out, and let “flatten” for one day- only so we weren’t battling the backing while trying to put up. The material is very good quality, not flimsy at all. The decals spread on the wall with ease, an are easily removed/replaced if you need to move or adjust. My wife was able to place these, adjust, and set in a matter of 35 minutes. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Better suited for flat (not textured) walls.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these flowers in our guest bedroom. Just note that if you have textured walls the stickers may lift in certain areas. I knew this already and bought them and kept them anyway, because I loved the quality of the flowers. So once a week or so when I'm in our guest bedroom I gently pat down the lifted areas. It's not that bad - no one else but you will notice. It's not as if the stickers fall off - just some of the edges will lift (not all the edges.)
customer_reviews.author: S&M

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love!!! This looks absolutely beautiful. I bought it originally for my office, but when it came I decided to try it out in my living room. I put it on my living room walls, wasn’t feeling it and moved it into my office and they still were sticky, even with all of the moving around. Looks amazing. Super easy to apply. Highly recommend and will probably buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney M

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wall decal and easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful in person. I have a curved wall in my girls room and it’s hard to decorate it. These were just the thing! Easy to work with and it took me about 15 minutes to apply them. I gently stuck them on and then made sure they were placed properly before fully adhering them. They are gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen S. Moreland

customer_reviews.title: Stunning and excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these flowers. They are very high quality. I really liked how I was able to gently place them on the wall and move them around until they were just right. It wasn’t like I had one shot at sticking it on the wall and hoped it looked right. They easily lifted and could be rearranged. They didn’t lift too easy to where they had trouble sticking though. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY DOLLAR!
customer_reviews.text: I love these flowers! I read all the reviews before purchasing. I get so many compliments on them! They look hand painted. Soooo easy to use, stick and unstick until you get them Just perfect. Great product worth every penny and far cheaper than wallpaper!
customer_reviews.author: Tiaonna

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I went back and forth with these for months and first went with the less expensive version... huge mistake! These are absolutely beautiful! Huge and great quality! Exactly what I was looking for. My 11 year old twins love them and I’m VERY happy I took the chance. I also restuck them several times for proper placement and they stick great. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mamaof4girlies

customer_reviews.title: It’s Gorgeous!!! And worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I love it so far, still playing around with the placement, but that also makes me love it even more. It is definitely reusable because I’ve moved these flowers and leaves about 5 times or more each! So I just followed the directions, wiped the walls down the night before, let it dry and then applied the peonies!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Richards

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting it to be bigger
customer_reviews.text: It's lovely, really lovely but for a hundred dollars I was expecting more. It's just not that big. I'm really disappointed. I designed my whole bedroom around this mural. I wish I had returned it when I had the chance.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use & Goregous!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! So easy to use and look beautiful on the wall. I bought two sets to do a mural in my daughter’s nursery and it came out perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Abby Robertson

customer_reviews.title: So pretty! So easy to apply!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these wall decals! They are also soft & beautiful! They look just like in the pictures. & they are so easy to apply! Restickable if you mess up. There’s lots of different shapes, so you can create different design arrangements. They completely transformed my whole room.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra N. Caraballo

customer_reviews.title: So pretty but came crushed with blemishes.
customer_reviews.text: These are amazingly beautiful decals. They were easy to use and user friendly by being able to adjust them a bit. Ours came in a crushed box so I wasn’t happy they were somewhat crumpled but they seem to have no adverse effects. My daughters walls are slightly textured so the large flowers are not sticking well but pushing down is helping. Ours also had a couple blemishes which also didn’t make me happy but they’re so pretty and I’m happy overall. I definitely suggest having someone help place them but it was quick and easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and large but does not stick well.
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and true to the image.. however they will not stick on my walls, I have tried all the tricks and will have to resort to wallpaper adhesive. I don’t regret getting them because they are beautiful but I am disappointed with the adhesive, it is not very sticky at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing bad to say about this product. The flowers are gorgeous, good quality, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very vibrant and eye catching
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these easy to apply wall decals. The color is vibrant and the details in the flowers looks very vivid. Pricey, but worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Just like the photos
customer_reviews.text: You’re going to love them! Flowers are nice and large and very natural and delicate looking. Love, Love, LOVE the quality, customer service and ease of applying and moving them.I have moved them from wall-to-wall since I bought them and they always adhere perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: R.S.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: phenomenal quality. looks like it was painted on the wall. not too hard to put up either. recommend a plastic spackle knife to smooth the stickers out as you put them on. stickers can be removed and restuck but only a couple times or these lose too much of their adhesive. does not ruin walls!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely beautiful! Recommendation to cut them out so you have the backing on them and then place on wall. Once you have them how you want them, peel off the backing and place onto clean wall. We love them so much!
customer_reviews.author: Krysta

customer_reviews.title: nice look
customer_reviews.text: love these decals...adhesive is very easy to use...still up and its been 9 months....
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: Sooo obsessed with how this turned out! Our nursery is super tiny and these beautiful decals make our tiny nursery look gorgeous. Very easy application as well, not sure how well they’d stick a second time around but very beautiful to look at now 😊
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and apply/reapply
customer_reviews.text: These were so easy to use! ! ! They were easy to apply and then remove and reapply to get the exact look that we wanted. I’ve used decals like this in the past and they weren’t nearly as easy as these ones. They were the perfect addition to the room!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin K.

customer_reviews.title: Try it!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Great quality and flexible for those ocd folks. I readjusted mine do many times and it kept its stickyness. I only used half in these photos.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby D.

customer_reviews.title: Def worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey but super cute. Easy to use since they are stickers, but you need a little bit of creativity for wall placement. All flowers and leaves come as individuals on sheet, not necessarily a bad thing, so you can place any direction and pair as you like
customer_reviews.author: NChisum

customer_reviews.title: These are Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These decals are great. They are so beautiful and easy to use. I have get compliments from everyone who sees them. I put them on the wall so easily and they are so easy to move if you put them in the wrong spot.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Cataldo

customer_reviews.title: Seriously so pretty and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This product and company is AMAZING! Shipping was super fast, customer service was extra friendly when I called to see if there were sample colors to try on my walls beforehand and the product itself is great quality and was so easy to use and apply! While I probably won’t leave them exactly as they’re placed right now, I know I won’t have any problem moving and replacing them. I am still decorating and want to add a wooden wordy sign over my bed, so I’ll have to make some adjustments to the placement of the flowers.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Corbin

customer_reviews.title: Just stunning
customer_reviews.text: These decals are absolutely amazing. They adhere to the wall without issues and can be removed easily. They are not transparent or translucent at all like most decals, as you cannot see the wall color once applied. They are large and can be arranged in whichever order you prefer for your space. We used ours for our baby girls’ nursery and have received tons of compliments. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: extremely happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so VERY happy with the quality!! I was so worried that they would look pixelated and tear when we pealed them off. I was pleasantly surprised with how beautiful they looked in person and that we didn't tear not one bc they are thicker than any wall decals I've ever dealt with!! I would forsure recommend these to anyone! Our room is now complete!! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A.

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: This came out so beautifully. They are easy to remove and restick. I did not expect them to be this great honestly. Just make sure to let them lay out for a day or so until they are no longer bent
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed with these!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE BEAUTIFUL!!! Easy to use. No damage to the wall paint. My husband put these up in a no time for our baby nursery. We are in love!
customer_reviews.author: KimiWeintraub

customer_reviews.title: Nursery flowers
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous and really easy to stick and even move! They added the perfect touch to the nursery. One thing that made it super easy to figure out the design is to cut the flowers out first (leave them sticking on the paper) and then taping them on the wall to move them around!
customer_reviews.author: Ahoek12

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: These are so adorable! I have textured walls, so I had a lot of pressing to do to ensure they stay up. But how fun! I may order another set to continue in other areas of the nursery. Don’t mind the lighting, that time of day.
customer_reviews.author: SpiceAjax

customer_reviews.title: Even better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, arrived in perfect condition. These are thicker than I expected and the quality feels great. We just put these up today so I can’t speak on how well they will stay just yet but I feel like they’ll stay on without issue. We have lightly textured walls and had no issues. Easy to remove to reposition and I’m in love with the final results.
customer_reviews.author: Zoie Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to upgrade furniture!
customer_reviews.text: These flowers are absolutely stunning!! I had a plain white credenza that I couldn’t replace with anything better so I ordered these stickers to give it a whole new look. No mess, super easy. And I couldn’t be happier with the result.
customer_reviews.author: Raphi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Flowers!
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked them a little bigger and they are a bit expensive for my taste, but overall they are great! They are easy to install and you can easily rearrange if needed. They are slightly darker than pictured, at least the vintage color, but they are still beautiful. If you don't want to paint the actual flowers, it is a great substitute, just keep in mind that you are litmited to a size.
customer_reviews.author: Graciela De la Llata

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but very high quality. You can peel and restick as needed without sacrificing the adhesive. Would (and have) recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put up. Honestly I overthought the process, but I don’t think you can make them look bad. They are absolutely adorable above baby girls crib!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous spending this much on wall decals not knowing the quality but I must say these are so beautiful! They turned out great!
customer_reviews.author: heather hedrick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, flexible design and seemingly durable.
customer_reviews.text: Love theses. Was a great adult kid craft project deciding on placement and hanging in my kitchen. It’s been a few months and there is no sign of bubling or slippage.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Gaddy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM! Don’t hesitate!!
customer_reviews.text: OBSESSED!! These are amazing! So easy to hang and you can reposition them multiple times! They are really well made and look beautiful!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephany R

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They are beautiful and easy to apply and reapply as needed! Great quality really worth the cost! I purchased two sets as I placed them on the other side of the room as well!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate, just buy them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets and am so excited with how they turned out! I moved some of the flowers more than once after being fully stuck to the wall and they had no issue reattaching. Great quality, love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So happy with them!
customer_reviews.text: Stickers went on very easily. They also look Exactly like the picture. They do come rolled up so make sure you lay them out flat overnight to make it easier to put them on.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are AMAZING! My husband and I felt like artists. The stickers were so easy to apply and then move if you decided you didn’t like where you put it the first time. I think it looks more beautiful than I could have imagined!! So much better than wallpaper. We have a lightly textured wall and had no issues and when you remove it doesn’t damage the paint. Go for it! You won’t regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Vintage Pink - easy peasy and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Day 1 and I’m loving them. I cut them out to place them on the floor. I think they look great! No bubbles that I can see and very easy to stick (and unstick to adjust).
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, almost looks hand-painted
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for a nursery. Very nice quality. Stickers do not ruin the paint. Very impressed. It almost seems to look hand-painted. Worth the money and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I squealed with glee when I opened the box!
customer_reviews.text: These are GORGEOUS! The colors are beautiful! They aren't shiny, they have a matte woven surface that looks very high end. The last thing I want is some big cheap looking sticker on the wall, so this is worth the money for a perfect statement wall. I want these in every room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!! Easy, quality, lovely product.
customer_reviews.text: These are seriously so pretty! They were easy to put on the wall too. They almost have a textured look to them so they looked great on our already textured wall.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: A little overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Came out cute but a little expensive for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Cappetta

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but won’t stay adhered to wall...
customer_reviews.text: The decals are beautiful and good quality. However, I am having a hard time with keeping them on the walls. They keep randomly falling off within a day. I want to keep them up so I will try and find some adhesive to work with them.
customer_reviews.author: Bianka Welcker

customer_reviews.title: They look very nice!!
customer_reviews.text: These are lovely! They look great and stay on the wall. The only complain I have is the price you get these many for 100$ and I don’t know how reusable they would be if we move them to another house. We’re military so we’re constantly moving these look amazing I hope they can be re used.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love. Easy to apply. Beautiful all around. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Katze

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: So cute love them !so much better then I thought they would look
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Sienega

customer_reviews.title: We put ours on the wall and they looked fantastic! The colors are gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: We put ours on the wall and they looked fantastic! The colors are gorgeous. But in just a few hours they all fell off the wall :( I guess it's the mixture of ate as humidity and a textured wall. However, masking tape sticks just fine. The flowers just had a hard time staying put. I hope we can glue them or something.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Stunning! A must purchase
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful!! The quality is amazing. The application is easy, the most difficult part is deciding where to place the flowers. It’s also easy to remove and replace if needed. Shipping was fast and the product itself is worth every penny. I can’t wait to get another set!!
customer_reviews.author: Martel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality! Beautiful on the wall!
customer_reviews.text: Love the roses, look so awesome in my teens shabbychic bedroom! Easy to apply, expensive, but the quality made it worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: SOO pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! Very easy to put up. I was even able to take them off and reposition. Love it. I want to get others for a different room
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wall decal
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful details and so easy to install! So worth it.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: These look perfect in her nursery. Very easy to stick on the wall. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chris H

customer_reviews.title: Not sticking to the wall- Seller, please respond!
customer_reviews.text: Hello. I got these in August 2019 for my daughter’s nursery and now they are no longer sticking to the wall. I followed the simple directions, and applied to a clean wall. The decals are no longer sticking to the wall. Can the seller please let me know what to do?
customer_reviews.author: Allison Kornas

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Very fast delivery, and extremely easy installation. I am absolutely in love with the color of the flowers and how the stickers look above the crib. They peeled off very easily, even despite the large size. I was able to re-position them and they still stuck to the wall without problems. Perfect and exactly what I was looking for!!
customer_reviews.author: MiaG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and well worth the money! I was iffy at first since they are so expensive but turned out great. We have very high gloss walls and had some issues getting them to stick but managed and are just being careful not to touch them.
customer_reviews.author: Haley J.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: They don't like paper. Feels more like vinyl wallpaper, but that's what makes them durable and easy to apply. I pulled down a few and moved them to another position. I ordered two sets. Make sure you turn the flowers a little so they all look different from each other.
customer_reviews.author: Clean Freak

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Before finding these I bought some from a really expensive online store and returned those... I bought two sets of these instead. I loved how easy they were to peel off and stick on the walls and I could peel them back off and place them in new spots since my ocd is crazy. So beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda LeMoult

customer_reviews.title: Love! Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love these they look extremely nice in my daughters nursery!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These decals are perfect! High quality and easy to use. For the perfectionist it took a bit longer than most to apply I’m sure. Overall these are great and look high end on the wall
customer_reviews.author: Clair Ratliff

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: These are worth every penny!!! The quality is way better than I expected and application was super easy. I have slightly textured walls and they stuck perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: k. herring

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Very good quality decals. Nice and thick, so they don’t rip when you remove them from the paper. Applied to clean walls that were painted about 1 month before. Have had no issues with peeling and they have been up for a few months now.
customer_reviews.author: KW&EF

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These decals are incredible! They are durable and easier to put on then you could imagine. They look so pretty. Five stars all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Pahl

customer_reviews.title: Big Bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: I love how it turned out! Just beautiful, I got lots of compliments. It was so easy. The colors are true black /white/gray so happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stunning! You can get very creative with these as there is no right or wrong way to place them. You make your own design. I ended up only using four flowers as they are very large. This color is vintage peach. I love it and hope it inspires you to decorate your room!
customer_reviews.author: Yoneidy Carreno

customer_reviews.title: If I made a mistake it was easy to move around but once it was down it ...
customer_reviews.text: These are IDIOT proof. I'm sooo not creative, I don't have an eye for this stuff, but it's peel and stick and you can arrange however you want. If I made a mistake it was easy to move around but once it was down it didn't peel up at the corners. Looks GORGEOUS. Worth the money. Such a statement.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...In a good way!
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn’t purchase these because they were a bit more expensive than others I found. I bought them though because the colors were perfect for the space that I needed them for, and I loved them so much I ended up buying another set the next day. These decals are super high quality, and look absolutely beautiful. Application was a breeze. Would totally purchase again! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use- great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the easiest decals I’ve ever used! Fantastic quality! I’ll definirely be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: These are really beautiful. they have an exact cut, no white edges. I have put them in my walk in closet to cover up imperfections in a wall. They are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: bart bxwell

customer_reviews.title: Great decals!
customer_reviews.text: Decala did not disappoint. They were a little pricey but certainly helped our nursery after we found out we had a daughter, not a son. Just wanted to post the picture for future buyers... Also, keep the backings hidden away somewhere for future use. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Michael McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but difficult to put on textured walls.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! I love these decals. It took a while on textured walls to get them to adhere, a little heat and rubbing with a soft cloth was needed, but they are still up. Glad I purchased these.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen K

customer_reviews.title: beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: these are beautiful, well made and easy to use and i get asked "did you paint those?!" all the time. great product
customer_reviews.author: k wilson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful flowers
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the mixed lavender purple set and they are absolutely gorgeous! The flowers have good detail to them, are a thick material that doesn’t seem like it’ll tear and are very easy to apply!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Giles

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful accent wall in master bedroom!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 for my master bedroom. Really beautiful. Turned out better than I imagined. Though time consuming to place how I wanted, as each flower and leaf are separate, it was fun to create and it was super easy to remove or reposition. Wish there had been a bit more greenery.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! These came in a roll and are very good quality. You can move them around a few times on the wall without losing any “stickiness”- worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am so pleased with the quality of these decals
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with the quality of these decals. They’re a heavy wallpaper material. They are able to be moved easily while you’re figuring out where to place them, and they are very secure once on the walls (no peeling corners). Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Kilmer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Loved the large scale, vintage color and ease of use! They are beautiful and I get compliments like crazy on these!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Heath

customer_reviews.title: Making a beautiful statement.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply, nice quality product. Took my damaged mirror to a work of art.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Lane-Moore

customer_reviews.title: Easy and durable
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, easy to use stickers. Very durable. I’ve had them up for a while and they still look perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Villalobos

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: It’s going to be in my new bathroom but I need to wait two weeks after I paint. So excited to put it up!!
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to put on!
customer_reviews.text: These were much easier to put up than I expected! And they look amazing! So happy I decided to purchase these instead of painting or putting up wallpaper in my daughters nursery. They really make the room look beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: chelsie

customer_reviews.title: Looks expensive and bigger than I imagined
customer_reviews.text: These stickers are awesome it does not matter in what order you put them and they still look amazing it completely decorated my daughters room it looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Mogilevski

customer_reviews.title: So simple and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The flowers were so easy to put on the wall and turned out beautiful. I’m seeing that these flowers come in a peach color and Im wondering if they would have looked better with my wall color. But very pleased friends and family love how my room turned out!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Amodio

customer_reviews.title: Pretty flowers
customer_reviews.text: These were the perfect addition for my daughters nursery. Easy to use and looks wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase, came within a few days to from US to Aus, amazing quality and exactly like picture also shipping much cheaper than buying direct from store!
customer_reviews.author: Samara

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these! They have a nice matte texture. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: McCary Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Stunning decal! Absolutely love it!! Will put up more pics on my IG: @monikaxo4
customer_reviews.author: monikaxo4

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these flower stickers
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with these flower stickers! I orginally wanted wallpaper for our nursery but didn’t want to deal with the hassle so I opted for these stickers and I am so happy I did. They are beautiful and super easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: Vic A.

product_meta.title: Peony Flowers Wall Sticker - Vintage Pink - by Simple Shapes
product_meta.description: Color:Vintage PinkSpringtime is peak season for peonies, but keep them blooming all year-long with our Peony Flowers Wall Sticker. The contemporary design and color palette of this wall sticker complements modern spaces and updates more traditional decor. This Wall Sticker makes a bold and elegant statement alone, but can also refresh an accent wall or add a bright wash of color to an existing collection of art and photographs. Size: 6 Separate peonies ranging in size from 11"w x 10"h to 26"w x 30"h 22 Separate leaves ranging in size from 2"w x 5"h to 12"w x 15"h What's Included: 6 Flowers 7 Large Leaves 15 Small LeavesAll artwork is original. 2017 SK Design Concepts LLC | Simple Shapes is a registered trademark of SK Design Concepts LLC
feature_bullets: Peony Flowers Peel and Stick Reusable Wall Stickers
